name: question
description: Code or variable name used by cohort to indicate survey question.

name: response
description: Code or value used by cohort to indicate response value for question.

name: responseDate
description: Date of response to survey question; date questionnaire was administered to patient.

name: questionLabel
description: Text string that provides more information about the question. Analogous to variable label used in codebook.
example: Feeling down, depressed or hopeless?, Little interest or pleasure in doing things?

name: responseLabel
description: Text string that provides more descriptive information about response value. Analogous to value labels used in codebook.
example: Not at all, Nearly every day, More than half the days, Several days

name: instrument
description: Text string that provides the name of the survey instrument used. For P2024, includes depression instruments (PHQ-2, PHQ-9, CES-D, BDI) and anxiety instruments (GAD-7, PHQ-5/PHQ-PD, BAI, SAMISS).
example: PHQ-9, GAD-7, PHQ-2, CES-D, BDI, BAI, PHQ-5, SAMISS

name: administration
description: Method of survey administration. Common methods: 'Self-administered, tablet or computer', 'Self-administered, paper', 'Interviewer-administered, face-to-face', 'Interviewer-administered, phone or video call', 'Audio Computer-Assisted Self-Interviews'. If none apply, use a concise, descriptive, consistently formatted text string label.
example: Self-administered, tablet or computer, Interviewer-administered, face-to-face
